content: This article **is an orphan, as no other articles link to it**. Please introduce links to this page from related articles. *(December 2025)* **Leonard Ng Keok Poh** is a Singaporean landscape architect. He currently serves at the [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) market director for Danish architecture firm [Henning Larsen Architects](/wiki/Henning_Larsen_Architects). Ng has focused on increasing green space in Singapore, including projects like [Bishan-Ang Mo Kio Park](/wiki/Bishan-Ang_Mo_Kio_Park), [Jurong Lake Garden](/wiki/Jurong_Lake_District), and [Kampung Admiralty](/wiki/Kampung_Admiralty). ## Career Formerly a proprietary trader at [United Overseas Bank](/wiki/United_Overseas_Bank), Ng took night classes at [Lincoln University](/wiki/Lincoln_University_(New_Zealand)) to become certified as a landscape architect. In 2023 Ng was conferred the Designer of the Year Award as part of Singapore’s President’s Design Award. He joined Atelier Dreiseiti in 2006, establishing the Singapore office. This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Leonard Ng
